data.description:
When you create this symbol, choose an action type: Attack, Guard, Objective, Spell, or Skill. When the creature bearing this symbol performs the chosen action, they lose 5 Hit Points and 5 Mind Points (before performing that action). Both amounts increase to 10 if you are level 20 or higher, or to 20 if you are level 40 or higher.

You Spend: @LOSS[2 ip]
Target Receives: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.JVYPNQEFS4xHxy5y], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.d8dAXHZMXS4AshTX], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.SscehEBtATkmthJT], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.17jxpxbzMLoRbZQe], or @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.895XAiPlHLScPmCU]
Target Loses: @LOSS[&step(5,10,20) hp]{5/10/20 HP} and @LOSS[&step(5,10,20) mp]{5/10/20 MP}
